document_data.mainbody:
Distorting cloth armor was a type of enchanted light armor, used in the 15 century DR.
These sets could have protective enchantments of a +1 or +2 strength. The armors cloth flowed and shifted when worn, making the wearer harder to hit. This type of magic was especially effective in defending against ranged attacks.
In the 15 century DR, distorting cloth armor was used across the Sword Coast North area, namely the Sword Mountains, the Old Owl Well, the city of Neverwinter, and by the neer-do-wells that laired within the ancient ruins of Illefarn.
